Project Description
A 1930's era style turn based strategy game centred on gangsters.

My aim is to produce a 1930's era style turn based strategy game centred on gangsters.
Currently it is in the idea stage so all input in terms of gameplay mechanics, story line and characters is welcome.

I envision it primarily with an isometric camera, but without the grid system of the older turn based games (vandal hearts, ff tactics) and more like the free roam style of Valkyria chronicles.

All aspects of the game need to be properly thought out, the game engine, platforms and so on.

If you would like to help out then feel free to apply or message me on here. I am a programmer by profession and I have zero design skills beyond drawing stick figures.
